title: Magic Dart
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| [![Magic dart.png](/images/4/47/Magic_dart.png)](/File:Magic_dart.png) Magic Dart |                                                                                                                                        |
| :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Level                                                                             | 1                                                                                                                                      |
| School1                                                                           | [Conjuration](/Conjurations "Conjurations")                                                                                            |
| Source(s)                                                                         | [Book of Conjurations](/Book_of_Conjurations "Book of Conjurations") [Book of Minor Magic](/Book_of_Minor_Magic "Book of Minor Magic") |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                       | 1                                                                                                                                      |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                         | 1                                                                                                                                      |
| Power Cap                                                                         | 25                                                                                                                                     |
| Range                                                                             | LOS                                                                                                                                    |
| Flags                                                                             | Dir or target, Needs tracer                                                                                                            |

|   |                                                          |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Fires a small bolt of magical energy which never misses. |

| Spell Details                           |                 |
| :-------------------------------------- | --------------- |
| Damage Formula                          | 1d(3 + Power/5) |
| Max Damage                              | 1d8             |
| [Max Power](/Spell_power "Spell power") | 25              |
| Range                                   | 7               |
| Targeting                               | Beam            |
| To-hit                                  | Never Miss      |
| Special                                 |                 |

**Magic Dart** is a level 1 [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations") spell which throws a dart of energy at an opponent, dealing damage. It can never miss or be [blocked](/SH "SH"), but [AC](/AC "AC") reduces its damage like any other attack.

[Hedge Wizards](/Hedge_Wizard "Hedge Wizard") and [Conjurers](/Conjurer "Conjurer") begin with this spell memorized.

## Strategy

Magic Dart deals less damage than other level 1 spells, but it has excellent range and can't miss. It can get you by the first floor or two. Since it has full [LOS](/LOS "LOS") range, it can be used to soften up enemies that your other spells (e.g. [Searing Ray](/Searing_Ray "Searing Ray")) can't reach.

Because it only costs 1 MP, Magic Dart has a few other uses:

- Activating [Iskenderun's Battlesphere](/Iskenderun%27s_Battlesphere "Iskenderun's Battlesphere")
- Detonating [ball lightnings](/Conjure_Ball_Lightning "Conjure Ball Lightning") early
- Getting an enemy's attention without [shouting](/Shout "Shout") yourself (note that the enemy can still shout).

By the mid game, it's impractical to use Magic Dart as a damage spell - the damage is simply too low. You may want to [forget](/Scroll_of_amnesia "Scroll of amnesia") it, especially if you aren't using Battlesphere.

## Monsters Version

The monster version is similar to the player version, but generally deals more damage.

The following enemies cast Magic Dart:

- o [![Blork the orc.png](/images/d/d6/Blork_the_orc.png)](/File:Blork_the_orc.png) **[Blork the orc](/Blork_the_orc "Blork the orc")** (3d4 damage)
- h [![Natasha.png](/images/c/c3/Natasha.png)](/File:Natasha.png) **[Natasha](/Natasha "Natasha")** (3d4 damage)
- o [![Orc wizard.png](/images/6/63/Orc_wizard.png)](/File:Orc_wizard.png) **[Orc wizard](/Orc_wizard "Orc wizard")** (3d4 damage)
- @ [![Sigmund.png](/images/6/64/Sigmund.png)](/File:Sigmund.png) **[Sigmund](/Sigmund "Sigmund")** (3d4 damage)

Magic Dart

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
 Magic Dart
Level 1
School1 Conjuration
Source(s) Book of Conjurations
Book of Minor Magic
Casting noise 1
Spell noise 1
Power Cap 25
Range LOS
Flags Dir or target, Needs tracer
Fires a small bolt of magical energy which never misses.
Spell Details
Damage Formula 1d(3 + Power/5)
Max Damage 1d8
Max Power 25
Range 7
Targeting Beam
To-hit Never Miss
Special

Magic Dart is a level 1 Conjurations spell which throws a dart of energy at an opponent, dealing damage. It can never miss or be blocked, but AC reduces its damage like any other attack.

Hedge Wizards and Conjurers begin with this spell memorized.

Strategy

Magic Dart deals less damage than other level 1 spells, but it has excellent range and can't miss. It can get you by the first floor or two. Since it has full LOS range, it can be used to soften up enemies that your other spells (e.g. Searing Ray) can't reach.

Because it only costs 1 MP, Magic Dart has a few other uses:

  • Activating Iskenderun's Battlesphere
  • Detonating ball lightnings early
  • Getting an enemy's attention without shouting yourself (note that the enemy can still shout).

By the mid game, it's impractical to use Magic Dart as a damage spell - the damage is simply too low. You may want to forget it, especially if you aren't using Battlesphere.

Monsters Version

The monster version is similar to the player version, but generally deals more damage.

The following enemies cast Magic Dart:

  • o Blork the orc (3d4 damage)
  • h Natasha (3d4 damage)
  • o Orc wizard (3d4 damage)
  • @ Sigmund (3d4 damage)
